sys_ui_message.key: please be advised that you require a medical certificate from the doctor or medical practitioner if your sick leave is for more than two days or you have taken sick leave more than once in an eight-week period.
sys_ui_message.message: Please be advised that you require a medical certificate from the doctor or medical practitioner if your sick leave is for more than two days or you have taken sick leave more than once in an eight-week period.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: please be advised that you require a medical certificate from the doctor or medical practitioner if your sick leave is for more than two days or you have taken sick leave more than once in an eight-week period.
